posts.title: post
posts.text: 排序算法快速排序12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728def quick_sort(arr, left, right): if left < right: position = get_position(arr, left, right) # 找出基准的位置 这个位置左边的都是小于基准的 右边的都是大于基准的 quick_sort(arr, left, position - 1) # 进行递归 左边的数组进行排序 右边的数组也进行排序 quick_sort(arr, position + 1, right)def get_position(arr, left, right): pivot = arr[left] # 以数组最左边的输作为基准 while left < right: # 从右边开始 while left < right and arr[right] >= pivot: # 如果右边的数大于基准 右指针向左移动 因为要找出小于基准的数 并且放到基准左边 right -= 1 arr[left] = arr[right] while left < right and arr[left] <= pivot: # 如果右边的数大于基准 右指针向左移动 因为要找出小于基准的数 并且放到基准左边 left += 1 arr[right] = arr[left] arr[left] = pivot # 此时left==right 指针指向同一个位置 这个位置是空的 把基准放到这个位置 return leftif __name__ == '__main__': test = [5, 2] quick_sort(test, 0, len(test) - 1) print(test)

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
